alert.note: Alert for Adams; Clay; Hall; Hamilton; Nuckolls; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 9:59PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jewell, western Clay, western Nuckolls, eastern Webster, Adams, southwestern Hamilton and southern Hall Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 958 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Guide Rock, or 31 miles south of Hastings, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lawrence and Rosemont around 1010 PM CDT. Blue Hill around 1015 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ayr, Glenvil, Hastings, Juniata, Trumbull, Hansen and Doniphan. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 293 and 304. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Clay; Hall; Hamilton; Nuckolls; Webster
